name: IKSlideshow
desc: The IKSlideshow class encapsulates a data source and options for a slideshow.

items.name: class func shared() -> IKSlideshow!
items.desc: Returns a shared instance of a slideshow.

items.name: func run(with: IKSlideshowDataSource!, inMode: String!, options: [AnyHashable : Any]!)
items.desc: Runs a slideshow that contains the specified kind of items, provided from a data source.

items.name: var autoPlayDelay: TimeInterval
items.desc: Controls the interval of time before a slideshow starts to play automatically.

items.name: func indexOfCurrentSlideshowItem() -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the current slideshow item.

items.name: func reloadData()
items.desc: Reloads the data for a slideshow.

items.name: func reloadItem(at: Int)
items.desc: Reloads the data for a slideshow, starting at the specified index.

items.name: class func canExport(toApplication: String!) -> Bool
items.desc: Finds out whether the slideshow can export its contents to an application.

items.name: class func exportItem(Any!, toApplication: String!)
items.desc: Exports a slideshow item to the application that has the provided bundle identifier.
